page.title: 06 Palm Bay Estate
page.content: With one interuption for the war the Palm Bay Estate has continued to grow eastward from Cornwall Gardens across Thanet farmland to Botany Road. The pre-war estate was of grass bordered straight line roads, but the last thirty years has given a complete pattern ofcurving avenues and cue-de-sacs. A maze to the unwary visitor. There seems to be a shortage of trees and the estate is open to the bitterly cold winds of winter. Access to the beach in summer has maintained the popularity of the area to home buyers. Most shopping must be done by car but a small terrace of shops provides the essentials. A library has been built in Northdown Park but the primary school is much further away by the Millmead estate.
